Name: Human Rights
About the game: Human Rights is an interactive lyric video / toy, developed as a companion piece to the song 'Human Rights' by Monster Mansion. Players explore a set of scenes and objects that relate to self expression, while listening to the song, which was inspired by the 2017 Australian same-sex marriage vote. The game was developed almost entirely by the writer/producer of the song, over the first two months of 2019.
